				[1534] list ''
					[1535] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText "Bring luscious back to your lips with Mineralogie's Lip Gloss. Our formula provides the sheerness and shine you expect in a gloss with the added benefit of light, yet rich color. Wear it alone or as an added boost to your lipstick. Mineralogie's Lip Gloss glides on smoothly and actually feels good on your lips. Paraben free with a soothing silky texture. Available in a wide range of shades which means it will be easy to find one that is perfect for you!"

step_data.thought:
I can see I'm already on the product details page for 'Mineralogie All Natural Lip Gloss, Ruby Rose'. The page contains comprehensive information about this beauty item including:

1. Product name and price ($20.00)
2. SKU (B0848QB12J)
3. Rating information (73% from 3 reviews)
4. Color options (Jasmine, Ruby Rose, Tequila Sunrise)
5. Quantity selector
6. Product image
7. Detailed product description under the 'Details' tab
8. Product specifications including package dimensions, UPC, manufacturer, etc.

Since I've successfully navigated to the product details page for a specific beauty item and all the information is visible on the current page, I've completed the requested task. I should inform the user that I've successfully viewed the product details.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully accessed the product details page for Mineralogie All Natural Lip Gloss in Ruby Rose. The page displays complete information including the price ($20.00), color options, product description, specifications, and customer reviews (73% rating from 3 reviews). You can see all details about this beauty item on the current page.')
